purpose: Facilitates the creation and deployment of web-based agents for various tasks post-training
principle: Built on a modular architecture allowing users to integrate and deploy web agents quickly using pre-defined templates and components
reusability: Offers a plug-and-play architecture with support for various templates and components, making it easy to extend and customize
limitations: Currently in alpha stage with limited community support and documentation
name: WebCanvas
description: All-in-one Web Agent framework for post-training. Start building with a few clicks!
highlight: All-in-one framework for building and deploying web agents with minimal setup
